Title: How a fake email compromised 2 billion weekly downloads #npm #hack
Description:
Your favorite npm package may have been hacked. In this quick update, we're breaking down the recent supply chain attack that affected packages with over 2 billion weekly downloads. The root cause was a crafty phishing email. Stay safe and always verify the source of your communications.

#Cybersecurity
